Templates.Title: iTEC Shop - Admin Confirmation Email
Templates.Content: Please confirm your account by clicking here

Templates.Title: iTEC Shop Confirmation
Templates.Content:
Welcome to {{settings:site_name}}!

You can confirm the activation of the account by accessing this link.

Don't forget you have to complete your profile in order to finish the registration process.

Thank you,
{{settings:site_name}} team.

Templates.Title: Q&A + Networking registration
Templates.Content:
Hello, {{firstName}} {{lastName}}!

You have registered for iTEC Shop - Q&A + Networking session - April 23rd, at Vox Technology Park, starting from 6 PM.

See you soon!

Templates.Title: iTEC Shop Reset Password
Templates.Content:
Hello!

to reset your iTEC Shop account password click the link below:
Reset password

Best regards,
{{settings:site_name}} team.

Templates.Title: iTEC Shop
Templates.Content:
Hello, {{firstName}} {{lastName}}!

You are receiving this email because you told us you can't make it to iTEC Shop 2019 and we have deactivated your account.

If you change your mind, please let us know by sending an email to contact@iTEC Shop.eu.

Best regards,
{{settings:site_name}} team.

Templates.Title: iTEC Shop Account
Templates.Content:
Welcome to {{settings:site_name}}!

You can access your account by accessing this link.

Thank you,
{{settings:site_name}} team.
